CONVERSATION GROUP: Are we there yet?  How much longer?
Somehow I'll find the strength to carry on to Luskan.
Bless you for keeping us safe.
Why would there be any trouble?
You wanted to travel through this territory without guards?
Guarding you is no picnic, either.

I did a little research on your "guild"... a word I use in the loosest way possible. It turns out that records of your founding simply don't exist. No one can say what the Burning Dawn was doing, really, before fifty years ago.
And the name, "Burning Dawn"? Is that supposed to make me feel safe? It's not exactly a name that makes one feel safe. not like "the Order of the Gauntlet" or "the Harpers."

Ha! I can take care of myself. Far better than any fly-by-night guild of adventurers and likely thieves! Whenever we hire on mercs as guards, things seem to go missing from my crates. So who took them, eh? The other merchants?! I think NOT!
What "demonic goings-on" are you talking about?
So you say. But I know better than to trust mercs at their word.
BK It's been a peaceful trip so far. I sure hope nothing happens on the way to Luskan.
Is that a threat? That sounded like a threat.
IF: Grump_argument_started, IF NOT: Grump_OpinionChanged; SET: Grump_OpinionChanged
I... I'm so, so sorry about before. Whatever I may have said before, I am truly grateful for your guild now.
No. You are not just mercenaries. You're bloody heroes!
I hope you rout out every last one of them! They deserve to burn for what they did!
Yes. I'll speak a prayer to Tymora for her favor on the rest of the journey. Every little bit of luck helps.
